description: Blue False Indigo is a truly remarkable plant species. With its attractive and showy blue flowers, it will provide a wonderful splash of color in the garden. Its textured foliage gives it an attractive appearance all season long, as it doesn't need to be deadheaded or pruned to keep it looking its best. Additionally, it is extremely drought and heat tolerant, making it perfect for hot, dry environments. Its blooms attract bees and butterflies throughout the season, and its leaves provide important food for wildlife. Its woody taproot helps to improve the soil, making it ideal for xeriscaping and low maintenance gardens. Blue False Indigo is the perfect choice for a beautiful and low maintenance garden!
